channel.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
channel.description:
This is my second model, I no most of you didn't like my first... But Thanks for the criticism I needed it, so I came out with something new Hope you like it!
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/381/picture1lq.png[/img]
[img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/6509/picture2dd.png[/img]
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/7873/picture3lo.png[/img]
[img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/7972/picture4zf.png[/img]
Heres a video of it! :D [url=http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/852/wv3.mp4]http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/852/wv3.mp4[/url]
Please don't hate it...
CREDITS 50 % me 25 % you guys for making me understand what a good model is 25 % Reyx for make the tut on primitave models
EDIT: I need a name for this weapon thing, post a comment with a suggestion Please

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @no1toldme2 no1toldme2
item.description:
@no1toldme2 wrote:

tezlaz:

Wow looks pretty good. Better than my first model when you try making a scythe again try to make the handle longer tho. IMO it would look better that way

I agree, although you should go back to rapture blade cause this isn’t really considerded a sythe. but nice

Read full topic

[/quote]

And its a name, get over it. Maybe if you read the fucking topic you’d see I suggested it as a joke.[/quote]
I personally think the name is BEAST and the model is a good start no one but amy_webb has said hardly any CC on my 1st model i couldn’t make a good scythe anytime unless i spend a lot of time on it

item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:16, topic:395869”][quote author=mironic link=topic=493055.msg3607175#msg3607175 date=1306201349]
Pukes inside my mouth D:… da hell is this?
[/quote]Don’t be an asshole to him, he’s still new. Would you like to see one of my first models to compare? Maybe then you can realize that not everyone begins an amazing modeler, they have to make progress.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Not everyone can be talented off the bat you dicks.

Seriously, I’m getting sick of the immaturity. Its not helping, its hurting. Get the fuck over yourselves and stop, it just makes you look like a douche bag and I become even more tempted to leave, and I’m more than sure that others agree.[/quote]
Im not saying its a bad model… its good for a start… but rapture… really? the whole thing is stupid -.- making items about it is stupid…

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @auroth auroth
item.description:
@auroth wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:12, topic:395869”]You shouldn’t have done that! The knife tool simply makes more segments so you can manipulate the model easier. Its like creating lines between other lines.

And don’t listen to people who simply say your model sucks, and don’t get upset over it. Ignore posts from people like that and don’t cry over spilled milk. You’re a beginner at modeling, so you have tons of time to improve, and you won’t be great at it right off the bat (unless you’re Dylan, but he’s special :P)[/quote]

Yeah i know I shouldnt have done that atleast know I do and ok Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You shouldn’t have done that! The knife tool simply makes more segments so you can manipulate the model easier. Its like creating lines between other lines.

And don’t listen to people who simply say your model sucks, and don’t get upset over it. Ignore posts from people like that and don’t cry over spilled milk. You’re a beginner at modeling, so you have tons of time to improve, and you won’t be great at it right off the bat (unless you’re Dylan, but he’s special :P)

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @auroth auroth
item.description:
@auroth wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:7, topic:395869”][quote author=auroth link=topic=493055.msg3604677#msg3604677 date=1305993064]
if you guys don’t like this, then Ill just stop making models…
[/quote]
That just sounded depressing. It doesn’t matter what we think, were always going to hate stuff from begginers, but this is your learning time, take our hate and learn from it. Learn how to go threw every pixel of something over and over and prefect it.[/quote]

Ok thanks for the tip :o

Try for a sword, not a... thing...

Tooo boring…

auroth:

if you guys don’t like this, then Ill just stop making models…

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @auroth auroth
item.description:
@auroth wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:4, topic:395869”]Well first, let me tell you what to improve on.

Try making the blade just a little bit smaller. Its far too big and kinda takes away from the rest of the model Try segmenting it more with the knife tool and manipulating it more so it seems less blocky and more curved. It could become a very good scythe!

As for a name… Rapture Blade?[/quote]

Ok thanks!
Rapture Blade Hmmmm Sounds good to me
Thanks Again!

Can you post a wireframe, please?

Yeah sure 1 sec

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture Sythe **2nd Model**
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Well first, let me tell you what to improve on.

Try making the blade just a little bit smaller. Its far too big and kinda takes away from the rest of the model Try segmenting it more with the knife tool and manipulating it more so it seems less blocky and more curved. It could become a very good scythe!

As for a name… Rapture Blade?

Read full topic
